snippet: Timothy M. Dolan, the ebullient leader of the archdiocese of New York, has a high goal: restoring the scandal-ravaged image of the Roman Catholic Church in America.
abstract: Archbishop Timothy M Dolan, head of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York who will become a cardinal in February, hopes to restore the image of his church after years of scandal; question remains whether distracted, liberal, scandal-weary New Yorkers are willing to listen to a conservative voice, even one as entertaining as his. as entertaining as his.
lead_paragraph: Timothy M. Dolan, the ebullient leader of the archdiocese of New York, has a high goal: restoring the scandal-ravaged image of the Roman Catholic Church in America.

headline.seo: Timothy Dolan, New York’s Next Cardinal
